title: Han will surrender
text: Me, @An Ordinary Strike  and @KokoThizzba #LieutenantOfKou are betting on whether there will be any fighting at all in Shintei between Qin and Han before an official, central surrender. Strike and I say that Han will coordinate a surrender without any fighting done, Thizz is saying the some minimum fighting is required. In the scenario where Han is coerced by Qin invading the city to a surrender without any fighting at all (not a single Han guard killed), we both lose.
punishment: The winner will pick name and profile picture for the loser for 1 week.

title: Han King will commit suicide
text: Me and @HistoRei are betting on the Han king. Rei says that the king will attempt suicide and that Nei will stop him. I say that won't happen.
punishment: Loser of this bet will have to rabidly defend the Han king for a month in any discussion they are in..

title: Chu will attack Wei during Han desctruction campaign
text:
@{giorgos} me and @{strike} are betting whether Chu will attack Wei at any point during the Han-Qin war. I say Chu will not attack Wei, Horse Breeder says Chu will take the opportunity.
As an attack counts Chu getting or attempting to get land/forts/cities out of Wei, passing through to attack Qin, even if it includes minor skirmishes, does not count.
punishment:
If @{giorgos} lose, @{giorgos} will have to join the duke Hyou army and frevently support it for a week.

If @{giorgos} win, @{strike} gotta abandon the Duke Hyou army for a week and hate it relentlessly.

title: Han Falls by the end of arc
text:
@{luisitano}, @{myke} @{abz} @{Toe kingdomle's bot} are betting on Han Falling or not falling this arc fully.

@{luisitano} am betting on Han NOT falling fully.

They @{myke} @{abz} @{Toe kingdomle's bot} are betting on Han Falling Fully.
punishment: Losers get a one week mute.

title: A Wei-Han-Chu alliance
text:
@{Conde De Arraialos} and @{Lusitano} are betting on A Wei-Han-Chu alliance.

@{Lusitano} says that it will NOT happen.

@{Conde De Arraialos} say that it WILL happen.

If those 2 states do send aid to Han (such as just sending some soldiers or food or money) but don't actually make an alliance it won't count for the 3 way alliance so @{Conde De Arraialos} lose.
punishment:
If @{Lusitano} loses, @{Conde De Arraialos} draw his pfp (of which we agree on when the time comes).

If @{Conde De Arraialos} lose, @{Lusitano} draws my pfp (of which we agree on when the time comes).

Pfp to be used for 3 days.

title: Chu's move this ARC
text:
@{Settra} and @{Sky} made a bet:

If chu attacks wei or stay neutral he wins. if Chu attacks Qin in this arc I win.
punishment: if @{Settra} lose @{Settra} have to change pfp to Bamyuu for a week and if @{Settra} win @{Settra} changes @{Sky} to Ousen for a week.

title: HKKK's next move.
text: @{Gio} and @{Kaijin} are betting on HKKK's next move. @{Kaijin} thinks he is going to attack the Qin armies/hunker down in Nanyou. @{Gio} say he will be ordered to retreat and he will comply.
punishment: The loser will be named Kaine for 1 week

title: Ousen will appear in Han Invasion
text: The bet is that Ousen will make an appearance with his army in any theater of the Han invasion. This includes to help either Mouten or Ouhon, or with Chu if they ever attack. @{Sky} believe that he will, @{Toe kingdomle's bot} thinks he will not.
punishment: The winner gets to choose the losers name for a week.

title: 2nd Day battleground
text: @{latariox3, Duke Hyou Hobiler} and @{Strike} are betting if the next Han-Qin engagement will be a field battle or the siege of Shintei. @{Strike} believe that Qin and Han will have a field battle. @{latariox3} believes that Qin will immediately siege Shintei with no field battle taking place.
punishment: If @{Strike} win @{latariox3} has to join the Duke Hyou Army for a week. If @{Strike} lose @{latariox3} gets to choose my nickname for a week.

title: Ou Hon & Mou Ten appearing next chapter.
text:
@{Lusitano} @{Niyo}, @{Vlade} and @{StrikeEagle} (can't @ them because I get warning)

Are betting on Ou Hon & Mou Ten appearing next chapter. 

@{Niyo} & @{Vlade} say that they will appear.

@{Lusitano} and @{StrikeEagle} say they won't appear.

(Both have to appear for @{Vlade} and @{Niyo} to win in the chapter)
punishment:
If @{Lusitano} and @{StrikeEagle} win @{Vlade} joins the duke hyou army.
(Meaning he has to put -Duke Hyou at the end of his username or "DH Army" at the end or name of his choice approved by me.)

And @{Niyo} will have to get his name changed to "Niyo - Duke Hyou Army Horsebreeder"

If @{Lusitano} lose @{Lusitano} have to write on a piece of paper "I hate Duke Hyou" 500 times. (Post proof)

And if @{StrikeEagle} loses he has to change his pfp for 2 weeks to anything that @{Niyo} or @{Vlade} draw (decide between themselves or wear each pfp for a week) 
Pfp has to be appropriate.

title: Rokuomi dies this arc
text: @{StrikeEagle} and @{Jxxpiter} are betting on whether Rokuomi dies or not throughout the entirety of the Han arc. @{StrikeEagle} believes he will die, @{Jxxpiter} believes he'll live.
punishment: If @{StrikeEagle} wins, @{Jxxpiter} must join the Duke Hyou Army and support it for two weeks. If @{Jxxpiter} wins, @{StrikeEagle} has to change his name to "Rokuomi Stan" for 2 weeks.

title: HSU structure
text: @{Gio} and @{Sky} are betting on the restructure of the HSU Ten is going to reveal. @{Gio} say that the commanders not named Shin and Kyoukai will be in command of similarly sized units. @{Sky} says there'll be a "wing" structure, where a couple commanders (again, not Kyoukai or Shin) will be leading several subunits.
punishment: The loser of the bet will change their name and profile picture of the winners choosing for one week.

title: 1 Day battle like Hango
text:
@{Kaijin} and @{Fuu Fighter General} vs @{Sky | #1 FuuFighterLeader} and @{Rei} are betting on how long would the battle last.
@{Tengri} said it would take 1 day like in Hango.
@{Kaijin} said it would be more than than.

@{Fuu Fighter General} and @{Great General of Rei} also take part in it, but they re fighting against themselves. (@{Fuu Fighter General} is on my side and @{Rei} is on Sky side)

title: Wei and Zhao's moves, before or after Han loses in the battlefield
text:
@{Jxxpiter} and @{StrikeEagle} are betting on whether Wei and Zhao physically attack Mouten and/or Ouhon before or after Han loses in the massive field battle that's coming up. 

Bet is voided if we transition straight to the siege of Shintei without a field battle. @{StrikeEagle} thinks that they will attack after the Han army is defeated, @{Jxxpiter} believes they will attack before the Han army is defeated.
punishment: If @{Jxxpiter} loses he must join and support the Duke Hyou Army for 1 week, If @{StrikeEagle} Loses he must leave the Duke Hyou Army for one week.

title: SSJ or RBK life span
text: If Ssj outlives Riboku,@{micchukelz} will change his name to Ssj is the üêê with Ssj picture for a month,If @{Sherwel}  loses , he will change name to Ousen is the üêê with Ousen pic for a month

title: Who will marry Nei?
text: @{Sherwel} and @{Rei} are betting whether Nei will Marry Tou or that she's already married to Rakuakan. If the manga states Rakuakan is the husband @{Sherwel} will have to change your name to Cucked by Rakuakan. And if @{Rei} lose you change my name.
punishment: Punishment is for 2 weeks. Bet is voided if Nei was/gets married to Rakuakan/Tou.

title: HKKK vs KaryoTen outsmarting each other
text:
@{Kai} and @{KokoThizzba #LieutenantOfKou} are betting for who'll outsmart who in upcoming battle. If HKK outsmart Karyoten then @{Kai} win,if Karyoten outsmart HKK then @{Thizz} win

The outsmarting need to be more decisive like either more manuvers to be outsmarted constantly  like what Gyoun did in Shukai to ,or to lead to an event that can turn the battlefield around(if Hkk outsmart, ten then he s outsmarted back and they go back and forward like this without any of them breaking the ice would be pretty much void)

-any outside interferences are void,if Rakuakan or Tou turn that side of battle around. Also if only Shin or KK outsmart HKK it doesnt count,Ten need to outsmart him
punishment: Loser get name change for 1 week

title: EN gets a significant kill
text:
@{Fuu Fighter General} and @{Strike} are betting on whether En gets a significant kill this arc or not. @{Strike} is for, @{Fuu Fighter General} is against.

A significant kill will be defined as any Han character that has been named up to this point (including both named hkkk vassals), or any future named Han commander above the rank of 4k commander or a general.
punishment: If @{Fuu Fighter General} loses he must rename himself "#1 EN-SAN SIMP", and actively glaze En and support him over the span of one week. If  @{Strike} loses he must rename himself "En's Ass Wiper" for a week.

title: KK outperforming Shin? OMEGALUL
text: @{Gio}, @{Sabe}, @{Strike} and @{Vlade, KK #1 lieutenant} are betting on Kyoukai's relative performance to Shin. @{Gio}, @{Sabe} and @{Strike} say that Shin will outperform KK in this battle, @{Vlade, KK #1 lieutenant} says it will be KK who will come out on top.
punishment:
If the three of us win, @{Vlade, KK #1 lieutenant} will be named "KK never wins" and will bear a profile picture of your choice for a week.

If @{Vlade, KK #1 lieutenant} wins, the three of us will form the Kyoukai army and cosplay each as one of her known lieutenants for a month.

title: Nei's involvement in battle
text: @{Gio} and @{HistoRei} are betting on the involvement of princess Nei in this battle. @{HistoRei}  says she will ask Rakuakan to surrender at some point, I say the battle will fully end without her interfering at all.
punishment:
If @{Gio} lose @{Gio} will be named "CUCKED BY HAN" and use the slapping panel as my profile picture. If @{HistoRei} loses, he will be named "IT SHOULD HAVE BEEN ME" and use a panel of slain Rakuakan (or just shocked if he surives) as a profile picture. 

Both for 1 week

title: Kanto Bet? WTF
text: @{Gio} and @{HistoRei} are betting on Kou for this battle: he says that he will specifically lead  (not just participate as a veteran) the new recruits out of the Han encirclement, I say he will not.
punishment:
If @{Gio} win, @{HistoRei} will have to join the Kanto agenda for a month. 

If @{HistoRei} wins, he automatically wins all our running bets, meaning @{Gio} will have to serve all the punishments regardless of the actual outcome and have them count as a losing streak as per the server's betting rules

title: Who reaches RKK first?
text:
@{Gio} and @{Sky | #1 FuuFighterLeader} are betting on who will reach Rakuakan first. @{Gio} say Tou, @{Sky | #1 FuuFighterLeader} says Shin. 

If it's another named character that reaches Rakuakan (Rokuomi, Kankou, KK etc) we both lose our bragging rights for those calls
punishment: The winner gets to keep the bragging rights for calling the structure of the Hango fight ( Riboku sending SBS on Ousen) and this fight (Rakuakan also targeting Shin IF it actually happens).

title: DUMBEST BET OF THE ARC, RBK AND KAINE
text:
@{KaineAndTenIsTheTruth}  and @{Luffy}  are betting:

Winner takes your tag

I bet Riboku Defeats Qin in the end, marries Kaine and has a happy ending

Loser takes your tag,gets Kaine army unit ,Kaine pfp and no one else can share the title.

I don't care about the winner

Because this will take a long time, loser will never have a right to a personal color, and will be muted for the difference of chaoter release from sense. If sense never release loser will forever be muted
punishment: Winner takes your tag

title: Tou and his army will be enough alone to defeat the Rakuakan army
text: @{Sky | #1 FuuFighterLeader}  and @{Gio} are betting: @{Gio} say Tou and his army will be enough alone to defeat the Rakuakan army and kill Rakuakan himself. @{Sky} says some (any) help from HSU will be required for that.
punishment:
If @{Gio} win, @{Sky} will have to comment an admission of hardheadiness @{Gio} will dictate to him, to serve as a reminder for the future.

If @{Sky} wins, @{Gio} will from now on have to address him as Sky-sama. 

If Tou and his army win alone but Rakuakan survives the battle one way or the other, we both lose, and we will be obliged to refer to Thizz as Thizzler.

title: YokoYoko's Fate
text: @{Gio} and @{HistoRei} are betting on whether Yoko Yoko will die in the current engagement against HSU. @{Gio} say he will, @{HistoRei} says that he will somehow survive it. To specify further, current engagement isn't limited to the HSU members currently fighting him, but it will also stop counting as one should he for any reason remove himself from that battlefield (even if he later returns).
punishment: If @{Gio} win, @{HistoRei} loses the right to use the title "emperor of the rats" or anything similar. If @{HistoRei} wins, @{Gio} will have to adopt a rat related subject title, and @{Gio} will address him with the appropriate respect for a month

title: Yoko Yoko dies and RKK situation
text:
@{Blackdoc} says that if Yoko dies, RKK won't surrender. @{Vlade} say if Yoko dies, RKK will surrender.

If Yoko doesn't die, both of us(@{Vlade}and @{Blackdoc}) get muted for 1 week. If Yoko does die, Oriliss gets muted for 1 week.
punishment: Loser gets 1 week mute

title: Second DAY!!
text:
@{Giorgos}, @{Strike | Master of High Ground}, @{blackdoc3629}, and @{Nil} are betting that there WILL NOT be a second day, and @{Vlade} are betting that there WILL be a second day.

By second day, @{Vlade} mean any kind of fighting between the Han and Qin armies at Entei.
punishment: The loser(s) have agreed to be muted until next chapter release

title: KK's appearance
text:
@{Vlade} and @{Strike} are betting on whether or not KK appears in the next chapter.

@{Strike} says she will not appear, {Vlade} says she will.
punishment: If @{Strike} win @{Vlade} must name himself "#1 KyouKai Hater" and actively hate on her for 1 week. If @{Strike} lose, @{Strike} have to do the exact same thing but for En.

title: Chapter 828's rising army's prodigy
text: @{Gio} and @{Sky | #1 FuuFighterLeader} are betting on who is referred to by the title of chapter 828 "The rising army's prodigy". @{Gio} say Rakuakan,  @{Sky} says Yoko Yoko. If neither of us got it right we both lose.

text:
@{latariox3, Duke Hyou Hobiler} is betting that Han will win the next @{Vlade} is saying that Qin will win the next engagement.

If Han surrenders before then, the bet is voided.
punishment: The loser gets bragging rights

title: RKK fights next day!
text: @{Gio}, @{Sir Kite} and @{HistoRei} are betting on what Rakuakan's next course of action will be. @{Sir Kite} and @{Gio} claim that Rakuakan will fight in the Tousa plains, @{HistoRei} says he will not fight immediatelly one way or another.
punishment: If @{HistoRei} wins, @{Gio} and @{Sir Kite} will exchange identities for one week. If @{HistoRei} loses, he will have to cosplay @{Sir Kite} and @{Gio} for one week (who and when are up to him)

title: Shin will take command of the entire Qin army for any reason from the 2nd day
text: @{Gio}, @{Vlade, KK #1 lieutenant} and @{Sky | #1 FuuFighterLeader} are betting on whether Shin will take command of the entire Qin army for any reason from the 2nd day of the Han campaign till Han falls/Qin fails. @{Vlade, KK #1 lieutenant} and @{Gio} say he won't, @{Sky} says he will.
punishment: The loser(s) of the bet will be deprived of their betting rights for the rest of the arc.

title: Yoko Yoko and Rakuakan got killed offscreen in the battle of Tousa
text: @{Gio}, @{Strike |  Fuu Fighter Guild}  and @{NoirKingOfVoid} are betting on whether either/both of Yoko Yoko and Rakuakan got killed offscreen in the battle of Tousa. We define "offscreen" as any death that does not get fully featured as a fight: individual panels/fight segments narrated from a 3rd person point of view still count as offscreen. Strike and I say they will not die offscreen, @{NoirKingOfVoid} says that one or both will.
punishment: The winner will choose the profile picture and name of the loser for one week.

title: RKK's defense of Shintei for a week and no surrender before 836
text:
@{Gio}, @{Kite}, @{Strike} and @{Kaijin} are betting on the final stretch of the Han arc.  @{Kaijin} claims that Rakuakan will defend Shintei from active Qin attacks  for at least a week.  @{Kaijin} also claims that Shintei will not surrender in the next 4 chapters (up until and including chapter 836).

The rest of us disagree.
punishment:
If  @{Kaijin} wins, he gets to choose the name and our profile pictures for a month, and we will be obliged to support him in in-server arguments should he summons us directly.

If we win, we will choose any game Kaijin's computer can handle, and he will be obliged to stream it to completion within 3 months of the bet ending. 

If neither side wins, we all lose and we will have to cosplay as a named fodder of the Han court (no Nei, no PM Chou) for a week.

title: Yoko joins HSU or not
text: @{Sky} and @{Sir Kite} are betting if Yoko joins HSU or not. @{Sky} say he does and {Sir Kite} said no.
punishment: Loser will call themselves Bikei and use Bikei's only panel in the manga as their pfp for 1 week

punishment: If @{Strike} wins @{Ferret} forfeits all claims to his Imperial Rat throne and name Giorgios Heir. If @{Ferret} wins, strike must support ferret's propaganda. This must happen during the current arc.

text: @{Ferret} and @{Strike} are betting on if RKK and Nei are married. @{Ferret} thinks they are, @{Strike} is opposed. If @{Strike} or @{Ferret} loses they most take the punishments of all of the other's lost bets.

punishment: Should he not appear @{Sir Kite} wins and @{Historei} have to take the punishment of any 5 bets of his choosing. Should he appear @{Sir Kite} will have to back me in any bet next arc.
